DOC.brief_summary: The purpose study determine efficacy safety 1000 mg Aspirin ( study medication ) compare placebo ( control group without active substance ) 400 mg Ibuprofen ( control group active substance ) treating symptom back pain . The study design develop treatment method back pain advantage patient method currently available .
DOC.brief_title: Placebo Active Controlled , Double Dummy Study Prove Efficacy Aspirin Treatment Acute Low Back Pain
